Title: Ambarsariya
Writer: Surmeet Maavi (Additional Dialogue Writer), Dheeraj Rattan, Balraj Syal (dialogue writer)
Actors: Diljit Dosanjh, Monica Gill, Navneet Kaur Dhillon, Lauren Gottlieb
Plot: A secret agent who is posing as an insurance salesman tries to find an assassin, while also trying to juggle three women.
